channel.title: SwiftBar Releases
channel.description: Most recent SwiftBar releases (not test builds).

item.title: SwiftBar 1.1.0
item.description:
New Option to hide system menu items

New Support SF Symbols in item title

New SwiftBar environment properties passed to plugin scope

New Improved support for binary plugins

New Plugins with no output are automatically hidden from the menu bar, instead of showing ⚠️

New Ignore contents of hidden subfolders in the Plugin Folder

New ANSI colors support

New Opt-out from SwiftBar making files executable in the Plugin Folder

New Separate color options for dark/light appearance

New Auto-update mechanisms

Fixed: Allow icon and text in the menu bar

Fixed: Crash on start if the Plugin Folder was removed

Fixed: Plugins are not recognized when Plugin Folder path contains spaces

Fixed: Refreshing repository data lasts forever ...

Fixed: "Run in Terminal" creates new tabs both for Terminal and iTerm

Fixed: Couldn't get plugins from Plugin Repository

Fixed: Executable and parameters contains spaces is not escaped

item.title: SwiftBar 1.0.2
item.description:
New: Added "Send Feedback" menu item which opens issues page in this repository

Option to hide SwiftBar icon from the menu

Fixed: Script output parsing

Fixed: Image retention in the menu bar

Fixed: Separator not showing in submenus correctly

Fixed: Parameters `refresh=true` and `bash=...` don't work together

Fixed: Default menu font size

Fixed: Plugin Repository is not showing if plugin folder is not selected

Fixed: Don’t allow set /Application folder as plugin folder

Fixed: Invert font in menu bar when selected

item.title: SwiftBar 1.0.1
item.description:
Fixed: Template Images not Displaying

Improved: Changing plugin folder reloads plugins automatically

Improved: Not time plugins, i.e. `plugin.sh` run one time on launch(technically every 100 days)
